content: Investments Savings AMA SG Young Investment Asked by AnonymousAsked on 07 Sep 2018What do you plan to do after you achieve 1million in savings?5 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (5)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Kenichi Xi, nᴉʍ oʇ dǝnᴉʇsǝd 不能说的秘密 at Tag Team with Gabriel ThamLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 21 Sep 2018Don't let the $1 million "savings goal" deprive you from having a meaningful life.​AS you save, you can progress by enjoying urself with deals tt have discount or value.​Help the communities by volunteering instead of donating money.​The $1 million you saved should help cover your expenses as a income generating vehicle.​All in all, the type of lifestyle your family choose will be the over all factor on how the $1 million should work for you.​Hope my reply helps.If you feel this reply have Quality, please upvote and check other Quality Reply.​https://seedly.sg/profile/a-kenichi-xiThank you.​​​0 comments2

Soh Sing Heng, Financial Blogger at SG Young InvestmentLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 09 Sep 2018I will make sure I invest this $1 Million in dividend stocks that generate passive income for me. The income generated from the savings will last a lifetime while still preserving the original $1M capital. Of course, there will be time to enjoy the fruits of labour too. I love travelling and probably will explore different countries. In fact, I am already doing that now but in a tighter budget only.. lol0 comments2
Yong Kah HweeLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 22 Sep 2018I'd make sure they make more money for me by investing! I'd also retire, spend my time on my hobbies and loved ones and travel!0 comments0
Jay Liu, Diploma in Accountancy  at KHEALevel 6. MasterAnswered on 21 Sep 2018Put into dividend paying stocks. Then go half retirement. Work part time to past time. 0 comments0
Nicholas ChanLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 21 Sep 2018Compound it further to earn more while leaving of on less than the interest so that the amount still grows! 0 comments0
